BML MUNJAL [ EXECUTIVE SEARCH Me iaiueicerys

VICE-CHANCELLOR | A Heo GROUP INITIATIVE

BMU, a fast-growing, research-driven university in Gurugram, near Delhi, india, is seeking an inspiring and visionary academic leader to serve as its next Vice-Chancellor, spearheading its next phase of growth.

Established in 2014 as a Non-Profit

The Role:

Lead BMU’s next phase of growth by driving a bold academic and research agenda, strengthening interdisciplinary innovation and global industry partnerships, and building faculty and research excellence. Foster an inclusive, values-driven culture while ensuring strong governance and long-term sustainability.

The Candidate:

A dynamic, globally minded academic leader with proven senior university leadership experience, strategic vision, strong financial acumen, and a passion for building and shaping young institutions.

APPLY AND SHAPE THE FUTURE

Apply to: vcsearch@bmu.edu.in | Deadline: 31 January 2026 www.bmu.edu.in
